thread.title: This isn't a hotel. It's a fantastic experience!
thread.title_full: This isn't a hotel. It's a fantastic experience! - Review of Hotel Molitor Paris - MGallery Collection, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tiberiu C
title: This isn't a hotel. It's a fantastic experience!
text:
I love hearing: "WELCOME TO MOLITOR, MR. CAPUDEAN!"
I've been lucky enough to stay twice in this wonderful property of ACCOR HOTELS.
There's nothing to compare it with. The history of this place is as overwhelming as it's beauty.
AMAZING MASTERPIECE! That's how I'd describe it. Art everywhere.
Amazing views over the most impressive pool in Paris and delicious food. That, combined with outstanding service makes MOLITOR my most favourite place in Paris.
Room Tip: All rooms are facing the pool. It's simply amazing! See more room tips Green Features: The Molitor is taking part in the Planet 21 project.
